basics.label: Accountant
basics.summary: A skilled accountant with deep knowledge in financial controls, GL, financial operations, Sarbanes-Oxley, and PeopleSoft.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Accountant for the Experimental Therapeutics Research department. Prepare financial reports, create financial models, reconcile accounts, assist with operating budgets, and review transactions for financial compliance.
highlights: Constructed a macro-enabled reconciliation template to reduce errors and maximize efficiency
Prepared training materials to standardize processes

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Full cycle accountant for several operating companies. Prepared financial statements, verified ledger entries, reconciled transactions, and provided information to auditors.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Both accountant and auditor in the department of financial services. Compiled and summarized accounting information, examined accounting documents for compliance, and prepared adjusting and closing entries.
